Title: Ladies Room
Plot: Don Draper is reluctant to talk about his past, or his childhood, whether with his wife Betty or his boss Roger Sterling. Joan Holloway teaches Peggy Olsen how to wrangle a free lunch out of some of the ad men. Roger Sterling raises the issue of working for the upcoming Nixon presidential campaign and while Don doesn't have much enthusiasm, senior partner Bert Cooper insists that they will go ahead and orders Don to put a team together. The creative team has to come up with an ad campaign for a
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Rosemarie DeWitt, Bryan Batt, , Maggie Siff, Talia Balsam, Anne Dudek, Marten Holden Weiner, Darby Stanchfield, Andy Umberger, Mark Kelly
